author: thomreis
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes obsolete classes and modules that were used in Run 1 for E/p calibration. In Run 2 this work is done by ECALELF instead and therefore the code can be removed.

resolves https://github.com/cms-AlCaDB/AlCaTools/issues/36

#### PR validation:

Passes limited matrix tests.
title: ECAL - Remove obsolete classes and modules
